title: Please Update README.md to mention new TOOLs
body:
There are new tools that MCP server is showing - `get_figma_data` , `download_figma_images` .

The TOOLs that README.md is showing - `get_node` and `get_file`.

If new TOOLs are different from the older ones then please write about it, for the contextual awareness.
author: sujayxaradhya

comments.body:
Whoops. Thought I updated that previously. In fact I had meant to remove that section from the README entirely as I didn't think it's super useful, but if you found it interesting I'll keep it.

Just updated!

> Whoops. Thought I updated that previously. In fact I had meant to remove that section from the README entirely as I didn't think it's super useful, but if you found it interesting I'll keep it.
> 
> Just updated!

Thanks alot 🙏 
This would really help everyone 💯

satisfaction_conditions: Documentation that accurately reflects the current available tools in the system
Up-to-date information about tool functionality for contextual awareness
Maintenance of documentation sections that users find valuable
